tasks.label: Run CVC5 Tests
tasks.command: nohup bash scripts/bench_solve.sh --input-dir /home/hanrui/SMTLIB/QF_SLIA --output-dir results --task cvc5 --solver cvc5 --timeout 10 --parallel 20 --excel-dir charts --excel-file QF_SLIA.xlsx --log-dir results/logs --log-file cvc5_solve.log &

tasks.label: Run Z3 Tests
tasks.command: nohup bash scripts/bench_solve.sh --input-dir /home/hanrui/SMTLIB/QF_SLIA --output-dir results --task z3 --solver z3 --timeout 10 --parallel 20 --excel-dir charts --excel-file QF_SLIA.xlsx --log-dir results/logs --log-file z3_solve.log &

tasks.label: Run Z3-Noodler Tests
tasks.command: nohup bash scripts/bench_solve.sh --input-dir /home/hanrui/SMTLIB/QF_SLIA --output-dir results --task z3-noodler --solver z3-noodler --timeout 10 --parallel 20 --excel-dir charts --excel-file QF_SLIA.xlsx --log-dir results/logs --log-file z3_noodler_solve.log &

tasks.label: Process All Results
tasks.command: python scripts/analysis_solve.py --input-excel charts/QF_SLIA.xlsx --log-dir results/cvc5 results/z3 results/z3-noodler --output-file charts/QF_SLIA_updated.xlsx

tasks.label: Git Commit and Push force
tasks.command: git add . && git commit --no-edit --amend && git push origin String-SMT-2024 --force
